pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, June 21, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, June 21, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement.

100 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery is required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
